channel.title: CVE Feed for themepoints -- Team Showcase
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themepoints -- Team Showcase

item.title: CVE-2023-5639|2024-08-02T08:07:32.431Z -- themepoints -- team%20showcase
item.description: The Team Showcase plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'tmfshortcode' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
